name: Darlene VARGO, an individual and as Administratrix of the Estate of Andrew A. Vargo, Deceased, Appellant, v. KOPPERS COMPANY, INC., ENGINEERING & CONSTRUCTION DIVISION, a/k/a Koppers Industries, Inc., Appellee

parties: Darlene VARGO, an individual and as Administratrix of the Estate of Andrew A. Vargo, Deceased, Appellant, v. KOPPERS COMPANY, INC., ENGINEERING & CONSTRUCTION DIVISION, a/k/a Koppers Industries, Inc., Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER CLARIFYING JUDGMENT
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 24th day of September, 1998, we DENY the Application for Reargument and REMAND this case to the Superior Court for consideration of issues raised but not decided in Appellee’s direct appeal.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
718 A.2d 754
Darlene VARGO, an individual and as Administratrix of the Estate of Andrew A. Vargo, Deceased, Appellant, v. KOPPERS COMPANY, INC., ENGINEERING & CONSTRUCTION DIVISION, a/k/a Koppers Industries, Inc., Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 24, 1998.
